titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make certain corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4811.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 10/25/2000--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4811 (appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001).
